https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wHdSlNpM2acvfJ2jUktKvSDDRVo.jpg A collection of artifacts from an archeological dig in Egypt are brought to the famous Louvre museum in Paris, and while experts are using a laser scanning device to determine the age of a sarcophagus, a ghostly spirit escapes and makes its way into the museum's electrical system. Belphegor, Phantom of the Louvre
